title: Ticket #4722: Document CONDOR_CONFIG=ONLY_ENV
description: Commit 5de7e746 by Matthew Farrellee on 2010-07-29 15:17:16 -0400 added the ability to set the environment variable CONDOR_CONFIG to ONLY_ENV. This disables loading any configuration files, and is useful if you want to entirely specify the environment through the environment (say, for testing). As best I can tell, this is not documented, but should be. Quick Git spelunking suggests this shipped in 7.6.1.
check_ins: 2015-Jan-14 09:46   Check-in [42197]: add short paragraph to section 3.3.1.1 about what env variable CONDOR_CONFIG=ONLY_ENV does #4722 (By Karen Miller )
